text: ve jahaan kaheen bhee pae gae unapar zillat (apamaan) thop dee gaee. kintu allaah kee rassee thaamen ya logon ka rassee, to aur baat hai. ve llaah ke prakop ke paatr hue aur unapar dashaaheenata thop dee gaee. yah isalie ki ve allaah kee aayaton ka inakaar aur nabiyon ko naahaq qatl karate rahe hai. aur yah isalie ki unhonne avagya kee aur seemollanghan karate rahe
